summary: Adds Requiem perks and makes most enemies a static level, to help fit into requiem.
descriptionHtml:
I decided to play a little bit of the Forgotten city and found out that the final boss was a supreme push-over. So i decided to try my hand at creating a patch. This is my first Patch but here's pretty much exactly what it does:
- Adds perks to the enemies and enemy variety you may encounter.
- Makes most enemies a static level to help fit into to requiems unleveled world
(This persumably makes the final boss not a pushover if you encounter him right after helgen, where as he only decides to use the shock spell. I still think the purpose of this mod should be more focused in its story however so most enemies are just level 5 to 15, some with rather mediocre perks)
- Created for Requiem 1.9.4.1 and The Forgotten City 1.8.1

DONT TREAT THIS AS AN WELL MADE PATCH! Literally created this in about 30 minutes. In no way is this some sort of "NRM" Patch er something. I personally just made this as something to keep as a placeholder till someone who actually knows what hes doing starts to create a patch for this.

Send in any bugs or leveling issues you have. Or simply if the boss is too easy or hard.
author: Tgbtgbt
